sentences.en: As he entered he thought he saw Drouet ascending the stairs with a key.
sentences.cn: 进门时,他觉得似乎看见杜洛埃拿着钥匙上了楼.

sentences.en: But first, we must sort the list ascending counts.
sentences.cn: 不过, 我们先得按照由小到大的顺序排序.

sentences.en: I knew at sunset I would meet the ascending veils of dread.
sentences.cn: 我知道会在黄昏见到那令人畏惧的幕布升起.

sentences.en: Now draw or trace ten dinosaurs in ascending order of size.
sentences.cn: 现在按照体型由小到大的顺序画出或是临摹出10只恐龙。

sentences.en: On the PivotTable or PivotChart toolbar, click Sort Ascending or Sort Descending.
sentences.cn: 在“数据透视表”或“数据透视图”工具栏上, 单击“升序排序”或“降序排序”.

sentences.en: Perhaps such holographic knowledge will even become one's new ascending preoccupation.
sentences.cn: 也许这类全息知识将进而成为你的提升新职业.

sentences.en: Preferences: Enables to view monthly transactions ordered by data, ascending or descending.
sentences.cn: 喜好: 可以升序或者降序查看每月的交易明细.

sentences.en: The ascending mineralized solutions move up to the cap of nearly horizontal.
sentences.cn: 上升矿化溶液运移到近于水平的科姆尔吉建造沉积层的顶盖部位.

sentences.en: The compensating descending motions normally occur over a much larger area than the ascending motion.
sentences.cn: 补偿下沉运动通常出现在比上升运动大得多的区域上.

sentences.en: The discussion is cast in the context of an ascending parcel of air.
sentences.cn: 讨论限定在上升气块的情况.

sentences.en: The local people turned the hillside series of ascending terraces for farming.
sentences.cn: 当地人把山坡变成了耕作用的一层层梯田.

sentences.en: The smoke is ascending slowly from the chimney.
We arrange its elements in ascending order, they are odd , even , odd , even , odd.
sentences.cn: 我们按其上升的顺序排列为奇、偶 、 奇 、 偶 、 奇.

sentences.en: We watched the mists ascending from the valley.
sentences.cn: 我们看着迷雾由山谷升起.

sentences.en: Yet there will stretch out before you an ever - lengthening , ever - ascending, ever - improving path.
sentences.cn: 然而你会发现你面前将会有一条一直在延长,一直向上, 一直在提高的路.

words.tran_cn: 上升的人或物；字母的上半（或下半）出头部分

trans.tran_en: If a group of things is arranged in ascending order, each thing is bigger, greater, or more important than the thing before it

trans.tran_cn: 上升，攀登( ascend的现在分词 )
